description: {"blocks":[{"key":"v9kg","text":"HiFi-Slide sequencing is a super-resolution spatial transcriptomics sequencing technology. This technique captures and spatially resolves genome-wide RNA expression in a submicron resolution for fresh-frozen tissue. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Human BioMolecular Atlas Program (HuBMAP) Method Development Community

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5e3u4","text":"Flow Cell Generation and Collection","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5j67b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1kddn","text":"A recycled Illumina flow cell was used to provide spatial coordinates for RNA molecules. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"anv34","text":"For MiniSeq flow cells, a pre-run modification is necessary to replace the NaOCl solution with the Tween-20 solution in the reagent cartridge. We replaced the NaOCl solution inside the MiniSeq reagent cartridge (MiniSeq Mid Output Kit (300-cycles) FC-420-1004 or MiniSeq High Output Reagent Kit (300-cycles) FC-420-1003) by washing well #31 on the cartridge with 0.1% Tween-20 Buffer twice, then adding 1.3 mL buffer to the well. In addition, to prevent carry-over contamination between experiments, a manual wash with NaOCl solution is performed each time before using the machine. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46lqt","text":"For NextSeq 2000, no modification is required. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9buvi","text":"Collected flow cells are stored in the 4℃ fridge prior to use. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69bd9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"clqnm","text":"Flow Cell Cutting","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3u100","text":"Take a photo of the flow cell surface before and after the cutting","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":66}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a0p40","text":"Use a marker pen and carefully outline the edges for cutting. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bq9vh","text":"Record the flow cell ID and label the flow cell on the bottom of the surfaces.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"10geq","text":"Use a Dremel tool with a diamond cutter and carefully remove the edges with high rpm.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"att26","text":"Collect the surfaces and place them in chambered slides.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2jmq8","text":"Terminal Priming","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aifi0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"87ora","text":"Label the slide surfaces clearly before pooling","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":47}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3nevl","text":"Prepare 500nM P7 primer solution in Low TE according to the slide size.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e13i9","text":"Immerse slides into the solution.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vfcv","text":"Incubate the tube at 95C for 5 minutes. Cool the tube at room temperature for 10 minutes.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b56va","text":"Collect the surfaces and place them in chambered slides; use a pipette to collect the extra liquid, then centrifuge to dry. Place the slides in a cell dish for temporary storage.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7cqmh","text":"BbSI Digestion","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5t13","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"caloj","text":"Prepare BbSI Mix by scaling up the following recipe:","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38ujg","text":"  Component50uL RXNBbSI (NEB, R0539)1uL10X NEBuffer r2.1 (10X)5uLWater44uL","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":74}],"data":{}},{"key":"frbb1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"damqq","text":"Place the slides into the tube with chilled BbSI Mix.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cum9q","text":"Incubate at 37C overnight, with gentle vortex if needed.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6itgg","text":"On the collection, place the slide on a chamfered slide and wash with pipetting water on the surfaces three times.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjica","text":" Use a pipette to collect the extra liquid, then centrifuge to dry. Place the slides in a cell dish for temporary storage.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[],"data":[["Component","50uL RXN"],["BbSI (NEB, R0539)","1uL"],["10X NEBuffer r2.1 (10X)","5uL"],["Water","44uL"]],"guid":"D5439EE5A5DA11EDA02B0A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["Component","50uL RXN"],["BbSI (NEB, R0539)","1uL"],["10X NEBuffer r2.1 (10X)","5uL"],["Water","44uL"]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"21ghs","text":"T4 Ligation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"35d70","text":"Prepare dT solution with 100nM T4 Strand A and 100nM T4 Strand T in Low TE solution. Incubated at 95 C for 5 minutes and chilled at room temperature.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f73d","text":"Prepare T4 Mix by scaling up the following recipe:","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8g0ev","text":"  Component20uL RXNT4 DNA Ligase Buffer (10X)\t2uLT4 DNA Ligase\t (NEB, M0202)1uLdT Solution1uL (5nM)Water16uL","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":108}],"data":{}},{"key":"eklk4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2h19k","text":"Incubate the tube at 16C overnight. Add gentle vortex if needed.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9g3ta","text":"Collect the surfaces and place them in chambered slides.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3nfkt","text":" Use a pipette to collect the extra liquid, then centrifuge to dry. Place the slides in a cell dish for temporary storage.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[],"data":[["Component","20uL RXN"],["T4 DNA Ligase Buffer (10X)\t","2uL"],["T4 DNA Ligase\t (NEB, M0202)","1uL"],["dT Solution","1uL (5nM)"],["Water","16uL"]],"guid":"F7FD5E72A5DA11EDA02B0A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["Component","20uL RXN"],["T4 DNA Ligase Buffer (10X)\t","2uL"],["T4 DNA Ligase\t (NEB, M0202)","1uL"],["dT Solution","1uL (5nM)"],["Water","16uL"]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c33i9","text":"Data processing and analysis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3la5f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"uoa1","text":"HiFi Slide sequencing basecell files were converted to raw reads by illumina software bcl2fastq (version 2.20.0.422).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"egb89","text":"HiFi Slide R1 reads were indexed by BWA (version 0.7.17-r1188). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"abakv","text":"Then de-duplicated spatial barcodes from the recycled flow cell were mapped to R1 reads using BWA-MEM. It is necessary to invoke the BWA-MEM parameter \"-a\".  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5k3jf","text":"HiFi Slide R2 reads were mapped to human genome by STAR (version 2.7.5c). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f1rot","text":"Reads uniquely aligned to human genome were extracted from the resultant sam file. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cljoj","text":"We used bedtools (version 2.30.0) to identify genes mapped by HiFi Slide R2 reads. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b5lj4","text":"Summary statistics such as number of spatially resolved HiFi Slide read pairs were calculated by in-house script. Visualization of results were performed by R (version 4.1.2).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3u6fq","text":"Tissue Sections","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5u954","text":"Transport tissue applied slides with dry ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":44}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dv5i9","text":"Image GFP or other proteins fluoresce channel before submerging in MeOH","type":"header-two","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":71}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7offl","text":"Prepare 1.5mL Methanol in tubes and store at -20℃.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eemkg","text":"Transfer the sample out of the storage and immerse it in an OCT medium with a mold.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2lgg7","text":"While waiting for the OCT medium to fully solidify, turn on the cryostat machine and set the blade temperature to -35℃ degree and chamber temperature to -20℃ degree.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fm038","text":"Once the sample block is fully solidified, use more OCT medium as a glue to anchor the sample block onto the specimen stage.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ffkg8","text":"Transfer the specimen stage into the chamber and wait until the sample block is fully attached.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6cj9c","text":"When the cryostat machine reaches its optimal temperature, place the specimen stage with the sample block onto the section stage. Start the sectioning process by trimming the block in a thicker blade setting until the sample is exposed. Make sure to clean the section stage when enough slices have been accumulated.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"55ev","text":"Once the sample has been exposed to an ideal extent, adjust the blade set to the desired thickness. Carefully execute the blade to avoid slice breaking.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"40p54","text":"If the slice is not ideal, use a small brush to sweep off the slice and make another slice. During this process, keep an eye on the chamber and blade temperature since either too high or low can lead to slice melting/breaking.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a2pmp","text":"When an ideal slice is sectioned, quickly flip open the glass cover slide and have the upside of the HIFI slide facing the slice.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9mdp","text":"The sample slice will stick onto the HIFI slide once a contact point has been established.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"81li6","text":"Capture any fluorescence image before the next step.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dg44s","text":"Retrieve the pre-chilled methanol from the storage, and immerse the slide into the tubes for 20 minutes.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3ncp","text":"Once the time is up, retrieve the slide out of the tube and wash the slide with water.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vsr0","text":"Allow the slide to air dry and proceed to the H \u0026 E staining procedure.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7q5hu","text":"Exonuclease I Treatment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fmmjs","text":"Incubation time shall be extended for pooled slides.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":52}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6df19","text":"Prepare Exon Mix by scaling up the following recipe:","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"17tnn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9nje","text":"  Component20uL RXNExonuclease I (E. coli) (NEB, M0293)2uLExonuclease I Reaction Buffer2uLWater16uL","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":99}],"data":[]},{"key":"92ohk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4j1ds","text":"Place the slides inside the tube and incubate for 3 hours at 37C; add a gentle vortex if needed. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4iu49","text":"Collect the surfaces and place them in chambered slides.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5qd42","text":" Use a pipette to collect the extra liquid, then centrifuge to dry. Place the slides in a cell dish for temporary storage.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8hcrp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[],"data":[["Component","20uL RXN"],["Exonuclease I (E. coli) (NEB, M0293)","2uL"],["Exonuclease I Reaction Buffer","2uL"],["Water","16uL"]],"guid":"DE4E5BE4A5DC11EDA02B0A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["Component","20uL RXN"],["Exonuclease I (E. coli) (NEB, M0293)","2uL"],["Exonuclease I Reaction Buffer","2uL"],["Water","16uL"]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8cq2n","text":"Elution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e9u3l","text":"Prepare 0.1 N NaOH solution with water.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fapm3","text":"In the cell dish or chambered glass, pipette enough NaOH solution to immerse the slide surface (NextSeq full: 150uL, half: 100uL).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2l2kt","text":"Incubate at room temperature for 10 minutes","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"24jrt","text":"Use a pipette and remove all solutions.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3dqpc","text":"Repeat NaOH washing three times.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2kesc","text":"Wash the surfaces with 200mM tris-HCl solution three times.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"38m6o","text":"Wash the surfaces with water three times.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5i59l","text":"Use a pipette to collect the extra liquid, then centrifuge to dry. Place the slides in a cell dish for temporary storage.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dhpsf","text":"H\u0026E","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5vpdh","text":"The staining procedure is accomplished by pipetting just enough volume of the staining reagent to cover the sample and washing it with water each time after the incubation. Depending on the sample size, 50 to 100 uL reagents are used each time.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1op28","text":"First, incubate the slide with Hematoxylin for 10 minutes, and dip the slide into a water reservoir to wash the slide. Be careful not to wash off any sample.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e79t5","text":"Then incubate the slide with a Bluing buffer for 5 minutes, and dip the slide into a new water reservoir.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fo1pk","text":"Lastly, incubate the slide with Eosin for 2 minutes, and dip the slide into a new water reservoir to wash off any remaining staining reagent. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2oipq","text":"Allow the slide to air dry, and image the slide under a microscope. Capture and archive structural details for later reference.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f1js3","text":"Tissue Digestion","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6dure","text":"Pre-warm the incubation instrument for higher efficiency","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":56}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"137l7","text":"Prepare the proteinase K reaction mix by the following recipe:","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"673l7","text":"  Component10uL RXNPepsin, reconstituted in 0.1M HCl5uLWater5uL","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":63}],"data":{}},{"key":"80j2j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"tp2v","text":"Transfer the slides into their own individual chamber, and pipette 70uL Pepsin solution to cover the full slide and 50uL for the half slide.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7e9hr","text":"Seal the chamber and place the chamber into the pre-warmed humidified incubation chamber for 10 minutes.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1kbu0","text":"Remove the reaction mix with a pipette at the corner of the chamber. Wash the slide surface with 0.1X SSC one time and water two times. Remove extra liquid by gently pipetting.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[],"data":[["Component","10uL RXN"],["Pepsin, reconstituted in 0.1M HCl","5uL"],["Water","5uL"]],"guid":"1CD63A31A5DD11EDA02B0A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["Component","10uL RXN"],["Pepsin, reconstituted in 0.1M HCl","5uL"],["Water","5uL"]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"antmd","text":"Reverse-Transcription","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6s7dc","text":"Add Visual TSO oligo for template switching RT and visualization of cDNA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":72}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"pmua","text":"Prepare Maxima H Minus Mix by scaling up the following recipe: ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6b3s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhqvh","text":"  Component20uL RXNMaxima H Minus Enzyme Mix (TF, K1652)1uLMaxima H Minus Buffer (RT Buffer)4uL10 mM dNTP1uLWater14uL(Optional) Visual TSO 10uM Oligo1uL, diluted in water","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":170}],"data":{}},{"key":"bppu5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a293l","text":"Add solution to the top of slide surfaces (150uL for full slide, 100uL for half slide). Incubated in a thermoshaker without vortexing or humidified chamber with sealed chambered slides at 42C overnight.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ufns","text":"On the second day, remove the reaction mix by pipetting.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ohqp","text":"Wash the slide surface with water three times, and remove the extra liquid by pipetting.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[],"data":[["Component","20uL RXN"],["Maxima H Minus Enzyme Mix (TF, K1652)","1uL"],["Maxima H Minus Buffer (RT Buffer)","4uL"],["10 mM dNTP","1uL"],["Water","14uL"],["(Optional) Visual TSO 10uM Oligo","1uL, diluted in water"]],"guid":"4E3CB6A9A5DD11EDA02B0A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["Component","20uL RXN"],["Maxima H Minus Enzyme Mix (TF, K1652)","1uL"],["Maxima H Minus Buffer (RT Buffer)","4uL"],["10 mM dNTP","1uL"],["Water","14uL"],["(Optional) Visual TSO 10uM Oligo","1uL, diluted in water"]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"deasn","text":"Exonuclease I Treatment*","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bneuk","text":"Prepare Exon Mix by scaling up the following recipe:","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2a48c","text":"  Component20uL RXNExonuclease I (E. coli) (NEB, M0293)2uLExonuclease I Reaction Buffer2uLWater16uL","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":99}],"data":{}},{"key":"7njnd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5sahk","text":"Place the slides in separate chambered slides, and add Exon Mix to the top of the surfaces.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2po4e","text":"Incubation at 37C for 3 hours.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ncji","text":"Use a pipette to collect the extra liquid, then centrifuge to dry. Place the slides in a cell dish for temporary storage. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[],"data":[["Component","20uL RXN"],["Exonuclease I (E. coli) (NEB, M0293)","2uL"],["Exonuclease I Reaction Buffer","2uL"],["Water","16uL"]],"guid":"7342F546A5DD11EDA02B0A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["Component","20uL RXN"],["Exonuclease I (E. coli) (NEB, M0293)","2uL"],["Exonuclease I Reaction Buffer","2uL"],["Water","16uL"]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1865j","text":"Elution I*","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dphvb","text":"Prepare 0.1 N NaOH solution with water.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3p7l8","text":"In the cell dish or chambered glass, pipette enough NaOH solution to immerse the slide surface (NextSeq full: 150uL, half: 100uL).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfp88","text":"Incubate at room temperature for 10 minutes","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8duf0","text":"Use a pipette and remove all solutions.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6v1lk","text":"Repeat NaOH washing three times.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"10dbn","text":"Wash the surfaces with 200mM tris-HCl solution three times.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aht75","text":"Wash the surfaces with water three times.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3em6p","text":"Use a pipette to collect the extra liquid, then centrifuge to dry. Place the slides in a cell dish for temporary storage.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bhotu","text":"(cDNA Visualization) Optional","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4eun0","text":"Add 100uL 1uM Visual TSO -low TE solution to the slide surface (50uL for half slide).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f7n65","text":"Incubate at room temperature for 30 minutes.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"40p6l","text":"Remove the solution by gentle pipetting, followed by washing with water three times, and centrifuge to dry.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cfvvk","text":"Prepare Visual solution by diluting Alexa-streptavidin conjugate to 5ug/mL with 1X PBS.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"88drk","text":"Add 300 visual solutions to each slide individually. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38gre","text":"Incubate for 2 hours in the dark at room temperature.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"42ei1","text":"Remove the liquid by pipetting. Wash the surfaces with 1X PBS three times.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"86rq2","text":"Place slides into a new transparent cell dish and remove extra liquid with pipetting.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7traf","text":"Remove extra retentions on edges by KimWipes.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jf7q","text":"Image the slide with brightfield and fluorescence alternatively and stack the images.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36huu","text":"After imaging, repeat the Elution I step to recover the slide for the next step.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"16eea","text":"Second-Strand Synthesis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a7gsh","text":"When scaling up the 2nd-strand mix, the concentration of random primer may be variated for optimizing outcomes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":111}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8lnqt","text":"Prepare Second-strand mix by scaling up the following recipe:","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qvpp","text":"  Component20uL RXNKelnow Frag, Exo-  (NEB, M0209)2uLNEBuffer 22uL10 mM dNTP2uLRandom Primer 0.3 (100uM)1uLWater13uL","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":116}],"data":{}},{"key":"dtc5e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5bulh","text":"Place the slides in separate chambered slides, and add Second Strand Mix to the top of the surfaces. For the full slide, use 150uL to 200uL. For half slide, use 100uL.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1usmj","text":"Incubation at 37C for 2 hours. Increasing incubation time if needed.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"52bc2","text":" Use a pipette and remove all solutions. Wash the surfaces with water three times.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9dt83","text":"Use a pipette to collect the extra liquid, then centrifuge to dry. Place the slides in a cell dish for temporary storage.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":[100,100],"data":[["Component","20uL RXN"],["Kelnow Frag, Exo-  (NEB, M0212)","2uL"],["NEBuffer 2","2uL"],["10 mM dNTP","2uL"],["Random Primer 0.3 (100uM)","1uL"],["Water","13uL"]],"guid":"BA91ABC4A5DD11EDA02B0A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Component","20uL RXN"],["Kelnow Frag, Exo-  (NEB, M0212)","2uL"],["NEBuffer 2","2uL"],["10 mM dNTP","2uL"],["Random Primer 0.3 (100uM)","1uL"],["Water","13uL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1k655","text":"Elution and Purification","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a599s","text":"Prepare 0.1 N NaOH solution with water.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21a6p","text":"In the cell dish or chambered glass, pipette enough NaOH solution to immerse the slide surface (NextSeq full: 50uL, half: 30uL).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ff8n","text":"Incubate at room temperature for 10 minutes","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1r27o","text":"Use a pipette and move all liquids to a 1.5 mL tube. Label the tubes.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ev0vj","text":"Repeat NaOH washing twice for half and twice for single slides. Pool the elutions to the same 1.5mL for each slide. The total volume shall be less than 150uL.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bsq4g","text":"Wash the surfaces with 200mM tris-HCl solution three times.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6c6u0","text":"Wash the surfaces with water three times.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"br1co","text":"Use a pipette to collect the extra liquid, then centrifuge to dry. Place the slides in a cell dish for temporary storage.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8dero","text":"Add 10uL 3M sodium acetate to the tube, mix by vortex, and spin it down.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hau8","text":"Purification with Monarch PCR \u0026 DNA purification kit, use 7:1 binding buffers and 30uL elution volume.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ptm7","text":"Repeat the Second Strand Step to increase the combined diversity of random priming libraries. Combine the libraries after PCR purification. (Three to four times.)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":162}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
